column2: Tindak Malaysia (2024), Government Gazette P.U. (B) 374 12/7/1990, Government Gazette P.U. (B) 4313 23/8/1990, New Straits Times 18/7/1990, 19/7/1990, https://www.oocities.org/hualian_studentclub/pilihanraya/pilihanraya_umum_sabah_1990.htm.  Refer to 1990_Other_Sources for other sources

This file does not have the candidate's age information. PBS and USNO are members of the Barisan Nasional Coalition but USNO is the state-level opposition. BERJAYA party left Barisan Nasional in 1986. Refer to 1990_DUN_Candidate_Notes for candidates who require sex verification. There is a discrepancy of total rejected votes and total unreturned votes. TindakMalaysia Network Services PLT is not responsible for any errors or omissions arising from the original data or its derivatives.
Composite between Parliamentary Code and DUN Code (Unique Identifier).
Party/Coalition (with Component Party) who won the seat
Indicator if there was one contestant for the said election. If yes, value Y is affixed. If none, it is left blank
Total Elector Count for 1990 Elections using  Electoral Roll certified on 9/6/1990
The difference between the highest valid votes and second highest valid votes
Proportion of Total Ballots Issued as a share of Total Electorate
Total number of ballot papers used at the poll
Total number of ballot papers issued but not put in the ballot box
Total number of rejected ballot papers
Total number of votes by electors
